'''15w38b''' is the twenty-fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on September 17, 2015<ref name="blogpost_15w38b">https://www.mojang.com/2015/09/minecraft-snapshot-15w38a/</ref> to fix some bugs, along with adding a new splash.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Added "doot doot".

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Skeleton horse]]s and [[zombie horse]]s'''
* Are now considered [[undead]] mobs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w38b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|88100|Slime blocks moved by pistons don't move entities (but only set the motion).
|;dev
|85730|When player dies all their Scoreboard Tags are cleared.
|88764|JSON signs with scoreboard objectives in them regenerate the chunks when the world is reloaded.
|;previous
|88832|White Banner<nowiki> + Shield = Black Shield</nowiki>.
|88833|Pistons don't move/bounce entities.
|88843|Items don't move up when stuck in block.
|88863|Cobblestone walls collision box messed up.
|88870|Flowers hitboxes are too big.
|;Private issues
|88837|Item duplication/corrupt player NBT.<ref name="blogpost_15w38b"/>
}}</onlyinclude>
